titles.title: Thwarting Regional Adversary Investments Now Act
Thwarting Regional Adversary Investments Now Act

To direct the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development to make available to government officials of nonadversarial countries in South and Central Asia training in analyzing, assessing, and mitigating any risk of accepting investment or lending from China, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Thwarting Regional Adversary Investments Now Act or TRAIN Act
This bill requires the U.S. Agency for International Development to make training available to appropriate government officials of non-adversarial countries in South and Central Asia on analyzing, assessing, and mitigating any legal or financial risk of accepting investment or lending from a foreign adversary that is in the region.
